    org.jetbrains.mps.openapi.language.SAbstractConcept.getQualifiedName()
    org.jetbrains.mps.openapi.language.SAbstractLink.getRole()
    use SNamedElement.getName()
    org.jetbrains.mps.openapi.language.SAbstractLink.isReference()
    boolean limits API to two link kinds possible
    org.jetbrains.mps.openapi.language.SContainmentLink.getDeclarationNode()

    org.jetbrains.mps.openapi.language.SLanguage.getLanguageVersion()

    org.jetbrains.mps.openapi.language.SReferenceLink.getDeclarationNode()
    org.jetbrains.mps.openapi.language.SReferenceLink.getRoleName()
    org.jetbrains.mps.openapi.language.SReferenceLink.isMultiple()
    org.jetbrains.mps.openapi.model.SModel.getModelName()
    Prefer SModel.getName() with access to distinct fractions of the name
    org.jetbrains.mps.openapi.model.SModel.Problem.getNode()
    use SModel.Problem.getAnchorNode() instead
    org.jetbrains.mps.openapi.model.SNode.addChild​(String, SNode)
    use addChild(SContainmentLink, SNode)
    org.jetbrains.mps.openapi.model.SNode.getChildren​(String)
    use getChildren(SContainmentLink)
    org.jetbrains.mps.openapi.model.SNode.getProperty​(String)
    use getProperty(SProperty)
    org.jetbrains.mps.openapi.model.SNode.getPropertyNames()
    use getProperties()
    org.jetbrains.mps.openapi.model.SNode.getReference​(String)
    use getReference(SReferenceLink)
    org.jetbrains.mps.openapi.model.SNode.getReferenceTarget​(String)
    use getReferenceTarget(SReferenceLink)
    org.jetbrains.mps.openapi.model.SNode.getRoleInParent()
    use getContainmentLink()
    org.jetbrains.mps.openapi.model.SNode.hasProperty​(String)
    use hasProperty(SProperty)
    org.jetbrains.mps.openapi.model.SNode.insertChildBefore​(String, SNode, SNode)
    use insertChildBefore(SContainmentLink, SNode, SNode)
    org.jetbrains.mps.openapi.model.SNode.setProperty​(String, String)
    use setProperty(SProperty)
    org.jetbrains.mps.openapi.model.SNode.setReference​(String, SReference)
    use setReference(SReferenceLink, SReference)
    org.jetbrains.mps.openapi.model.SNode.setReferenceTarget​(String, SNode)
    use setReferenceTarget(SReferenceLink, SNode)
    org.jetbrains.mps.openapi.model.SNodeAccessUtil.getProperty​(SNode, SProperty)
    This method returns serialized property value. Consider use SNodeAccessUtil.setPropertyValue(SNode, SProperty, Object) that supplies values as is
    org.jetbrains.mps.openapi.model.SNodeAccessUtil.hasProperty​(SNode, String)
    org.jetbrains.mps.openapi.model.SNodeAccessUtil.setProperty​(SNode, SProperty, String)
    This method takes serialized property value. Consider use SNodeAccessUtil.setPropertyValue(SNode, SProperty, Object) that consumes values as is
    org.jetbrains.mps.openapi.model.SNodeAccessUtil.setReference​(SNode, String, SReference)
    org.jetbrains.mps.openapi.model.SNodeAccessUtil.setReferenceTarget​(SNode, String, SNode)
    org.jetbrains.mps.openapi.model.SReference.getRole()
    org.jetbrains.mps.openapi.module.FacetsFacade.FacetFactory.create()
    override FacetsFacade.FacetFactory.create(SModule) instead.
    org.jetbrains.mps.openapi.module.FacetsFacade.getInstance()
    Use respective ComponentPlugin (i.e. MPSCore) to obtain instance of the registry.
    org.jetbrains.mps.openapi.module.FindUsagesFacade.findInstances​(SearchScope, Set<? extends SAbstractConcept>, boolean, ProgressMonitor)
    please use more general version below. consider using jetbrains.mps.util.CollectConsumer if you need to recreate the old behavior.
    org.jetbrains.mps.openapi.module.FindUsagesFacade.findModelUsages​(SearchScope, Set<SModelReference>, ProgressMonitor)
    please use more general version below. consider using jetbrains.mps.util.CollectConsumer if you need to recreate the old behavior.
    org.jetbrains.mps.openapi.module.FindUsagesFacade.findUsages​(SearchScope, Set<SNode>, ProgressMonitor)
    please use more general version below. consider using jetbrains.mps.util.CollectConsumer if you need to recreate the old behavior.
    org.jetbrains.mps.openapi.module.SRepository.getParent()
    org.jetbrains.mps.openapi.module.SRepository.getRepositoryAccess()
    org.jetbrains.mps.openapi.module.SRepositoryListener.repositoryCommandFinished​(SRepository)
    org.jetbrains.mps.openapi.module.SRepositoryListener.repositoryCommandStarted​(SRepository)
    org.jetbrains.mps.openapi.module.SRepositoryListener.updateFinished​(SRepository)
    org.jetbrains.mps.openapi.module.SRepositoryListener.updateStarted​(SRepository)
    org.jetbrains.mps.openapi.persistence.ModelFactory.canCreate​(DataSource, Map<String, String>)
    rather try calling ModelFactory.create(DataSource, SModelName, ModelLoadingOption...) method and catching the ModelCreationException during creation or use ModelFactory.supports(DataSource) method to acknowledge whether this data source is supported at all.
    org.jetbrains.mps.openapi.persistence.ModelRoot.canCreateModel​(String)
    we have a DataSourceFactory#create + ModelFactory.create(DataSource, SModelName, ModelLoadingOption...) to create a new model (from a new data source) having just a model name and a model root. this method gives out an insufficient API -- it kind of implies that a model root has the only way to create a model given a name, however obviously it is not true in a current MPS setup. Semantics of this method (as for 3.5) is to create a new model via default DataSourceFactory and default ModelFactory. Not sure if it makes sense at all shaped like this. The signature needs to be extended with a ModelFactory parameter. The same applies to the #createModel as well. [AP]
    org.jetbrains.mps.openapi.persistence.ModelRoot.canCreateModels()
    use specific #canCreateModel(SModelName)
    org.jetbrains.mps.openapi.persistence.PersistenceFacade.addFindUsagesParticipant​(FindUsagesParticipant)
    add/remove methods shall move to PersistenceRegistry (implementation class), instead, as components that perform registration may access PersistenceRegistry instance directly. I don't see a need to add/remove participants dynamically.
    org.jetbrains.mps.openapi.persistence.PersistenceFacade.addNavigationParticipant​(NavigationParticipant)
    see PersistenceFacade.addFindUsagesParticipant(FindUsagesParticipant) for reasons
    org.jetbrains.mps.openapi.persistence.PersistenceFacade.getDefaultModelFactory()
    unclear contract, use ModelFactoryRegistry#getDefault(DataSourceType) + PreinstalledModelFactoryTypes.PLAIN_XML
    org.jetbrains.mps.openapi.persistence.PersistenceFacade.getModelFactory​(String)
    use PersistenceFacade.getModelFactory(ModelFactoryType) instead
    org.jetbrains.mps.openapi.persistence.PersistenceFacade.removeFindUsagesParticipant​(FindUsagesParticipant)
    see PersistenceFacade.addFindUsagesParticipant(FindUsagesParticipant) for reasons
    org.jetbrains.mps.openapi.persistence.PersistenceFacade.removeNavigationParticipant​(NavigationParticipant)
    see PersistenceFacade.addFindUsagesParticipant(FindUsagesParticipant) for reasons
